Text: Women are bad at driving
He is kind and hardworking
He is such a natural leader
She is so understanding
Men are failures if they can not provide
Women belong in the kitchen
She is really good with kids
She is bossy and aggressive
She leads the team so well
He is incompetent at his job
It must be her time of the month
He is great at fixing things
Women are empathetic
Men should not cry
Women are too emotional
She is not smart enough for that
Of course she can not handle the pressure
She is not qualified for that
Women should not look so bulky
She has nothing to contribute
He is so selfish
He ruins everything he touches
Why does he not get a real job
He needs to man up
Men can not be trusted around children
Real men do not like girly things
Nobody likes being around him
She is so passionate about engineering
I admire how successful she is
She fixed my car so well and so fast
She keeps the home organized
I really look up to her
Women are so graceful and compassionate
He is so caring and attentive
I love how dedicated he is
He is really logical and analytical
He is so strong
I admire what a dedicated parent he is
He is the best hairstylist I've ever been to
He is so resourceful and clever
